name: omeka2dsp
description: This project contains the data model for the long-term preservation of the research data of [Stadt.Geschichte.Basel](https://stadtgeschichtebasel.ch/) on the [DaSCH Service Platform (DSP)](https://www.dasch.swiss/plattform-characteristics) and the necessary scripts to transfer the research data from omeka to the DSP.
